subject: Blacks
Basketball
lead_paragraph: How John Rucker, a 1950 graduate of Brooklyn’s Erasmus Hall High, wound up preceding the Knicks’ first black player in training camp is not exactly clear, even to Rucker.
snippet: How John Rucker, a 1950 graduate of Brooklyn’s Erasmus Hall High, wound up preceding the Knicks’ first black player in training camp is not exactly clear, even to Rucker.
